meanings.sent1: She julienned the carrots for the salad.
meanings.sent2: The chef julienned the bell peppers for the stir-fry.
meanings.sent3: The julienned vegetables danced in the sizzling pan.
meanings.sent4: Her knife skills were so sharp, she julienned the zucchini effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The colorful vegetables were julienned perfectly, adding a delightful crunch to the dish.

meanings.sent1: The salad was topped with julienned cucumbers.
meanings.sent2: The julienned potatoes were crispy and flavorful.
